name: Tux Defender
description:
Your network is under attack! Windows is trying to destroy your PCs!
After 30 seconds, the game ends and you're given a score; one for each remaining PC.

Controls:
Click on the Windows(s?) to destroy them.

NOTE: This is my first finished game I ever wrote in C++. The code is messy, the game is very basic, but I DID IT!

THIS GAME IS FOSS! LICENSED UNDER GNU GPL v3!
